#

Get started

# A new kind of vector database, built for developers

Zero management overhead, developer-friendly and open source. LanceDB is
lightweight, scales from development to production and is 100x cheaper than
alternatives

Use LanceDB Open SourceTry LanceDB Cloud

Backed by

javascriptpython

    
    
    // Embedded in your app, no servers to manage!
    
    const lancedb = require("vectordb");
    
    
    
    
    // Persist your embeddings, metadata, text, images, video, audio & more
    
    const db = await lancedb.connect("./data/my_db");
    
    const table = await db.openTable("my_table");
    
    
    
    
    // Production-ready, scalable vector search with optional SQL filters
    
    const query = await table.search([0.1, 0.3, 0.2])
    
                             .where("item != 'item foo'")
    
                             .limit(2)
    
                             .execute();
    
    
    # Embedded in your app, no servers to manage!
    
    import lancedb
    
    
    
    
    # Persist your embeddings, metadata, text, images, video, audio & more
    
    db = lancedb.connect("./data/my_db")
    
    table = db.open_table("my_table")
    
    
    
    
    # Production-ready, scalable vector search with optional SQL filters
    
    query = table.search([0.1, 0.3, 0.2])
    
                 .where("item != 'item foo'")
    
                 .limit(2)
    
                 .to_df()

## 🔎 Flexible and powerful search

Use a combination of vector, full text and SQL search to query your data. You
can use LanceDB to store and query anything — embeddings, documents and
metadata.

## 🚀 Scale up with on-disk storage

Unlike other vector databases, LanceDB shines by querying persistent storage
at breakneck speed. Scale from gigabytes to terabytes to petabytes without
blowing out your budget or sacrificing performance.

## ☁️ Serverless

No need to manage separate servers. LanceDB OSS runs embedded into your
application. LanceDB Cloud scales seamlessly with no servers.

# Ecosystem integrations

LanceDB APIs work seamlessly with the growing Python and Javascript ecosystem.
Manipulate data with DataFrames, build models with Pydantic, store and query
with LanceDB.

# Trusted by developers

Used by innovative companies building self-driving cars, generative AI apps,
tv streaming services, personalized e-commerce and more

“Gumtap is critically reliant on LanceDB: minimal operations overhead, best
scaling, and it is inexpensive. It's pretty clear that it is the right
approach towards vector search dbs.”

Chris MoodyCTO, Gumtap

“LanceDB is a powerful, versatile, and user-friendly tool that has greatly
enhanced our ability to handle large datasets and complex tasks. Its unique
blend of features and capabilities makes it an invaluable asset in the field
of data management. I highly recommend LanceDB - it truly is the real deal. ”

John TrenklePrincipal Machine Learning Engineer, Tubi

“LanceDB felt powerful yet lightweight, and fit well into my workflow. It was
far more intuitive for me. It was as if SQLite, the Python data ecosystem, and
a vector database had a child and named it LanceDB.”

Greg RedaML Engineer Consultant, Ex-Instacart MLE

# LanceDB Cloud

No servers to manage, auto re-indexing, caching, transparent pricing and a
dashboard to manage your data. Scale up today with LanceDB Cloud.

Sign up for the live beta.
